description: Wiltshire has been a go-to for baking tools in Australian kitchens since 1938, and the latest range of rose-gold products prove the brand is never going out of style. Available in the kitchenware aisle.
name: White Christmas Cupcakes Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180°C/160°C fan-forced. Line a Wiltshire Rose Gold 12-cup muffin pan with paper cases.

Using an electric mixer, beat butter, sugar and paste until pale and creamy. Beat in eggs, 1 at a time, until combined. Sift flour into mixture, then add milk and fold until combined. Divide mixture among prepared holes. Bake for 20-25 minutes or until a skewer inserted into the centres comes out clean. Cool in tray for 5 minutes. Transfer to a wire rack to cool completely.

Spoon icing into a piping bag fitted with a 1.5cm star nozzle. Pipe icing onto cupcakes. Using a large knife, gently and carefully run blade across the smooth side of the chocolate block to form long curls. Decorate cupcakes with white sprinkles and chocolate curls. Serve.
